headline: Show HN: I built a tool to aggregate your investments and follow other investors
description:
Hi HN!

Over the past year, we’ve been building Wealthly (https://wealthly.com), a tool to help you aggregate all your investments, and a community of investors who are sharing their portfolios and knowledge.

I started working on this idea because I had two personal frustrations:

1. I had a few different brokerage accounts, some retirement accounts, and a little crypto all in different places. It was hard to get a glance of everything I had. I tried all the products in the market, and they all had various issues (poor data quality, constant disconnect, didn’t support options, etc) 2. I learned a great deal about investing from other people online, but I always wanted to see where people actually put their money. I needed the transparency because it gave me a sense of comfort and trust

We’ve slowly built up a small group of users who have connected close to $18M of live assets. We’re hoping that the HN community will find a tool and a community like this useful!

I think whenever a product like this shows up, the number one thing people get most concerned with is always security and are you scraping brokerages for data. Unfortunately we don’t have a magic bullet around this issue in the US. We use the brokerages’ official OAuth APIs whenever we can, and resort to scraping when we’re forced to with no other solutions.

To address the security and privacy concerns people have, we are also thinking about open sourcing our connectors, and creating a desktop app where all your data is stored locally instead of in the cloud.

We haven’t opened up sign ups yet, but you can join with this invite link: https://join.wealth.ly/4WFYJ3.

Would love to hear any feedback!

This is my personal portfolio: https://wealth.ly/@sunny
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 我建立了一个工具来汇总你的投资并跟踪其他投资者
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 我建立了一個工具來彙總你的投資並跟蹤其他投資者
description_zh-Hans:
嗨，HN！

在过去的一年里，我们一直在建立Wealthly（https://wealthly.com），这是一个帮助您汇总所有投资的工具，以及一个分享他们的投资组合和知识的投资者社区。

我开始研究这个想法是因为我有两个个人挫折：

1。我有几个不同的经纪账户，一些退休账户，还有一些加密货币，都在不同的地方。我很难对我所拥有的一切一目了然。我尝试了市场上的所有产品，它们都有各种问题（数据质量差，不断断开连接，不支持选项，等等）。 2. 我从网上的其他人那里学到了很多投资知识，但我一直想看看人们到底把钱放在哪里。我需要透明度，因为它给了我一种舒适感和信任感

我们已经慢慢建立了一个小的用户群，他们已经连接了接近1800万美元的真实资产。我们希望HN社区会发现这样的工具和社区是有用的！

我认为每当这样的产品出现时，人们最关心的第一件事总是安全问题，以及你是否在搜刮经纪公司的数据。不幸的是，在美国，我们没有一个解决这个问题的灵丹妙药。

为了解决人们对安全和隐私的担忧，我们也在考虑开源我们的连接器，并创建一个桌面应用程序，将你的所有数据存储在本地，而不是在云端。

我们还没有开放注册，但你可以通过这个邀请链接加入。https://join.wealth.ly/4WFYJ3.

Would love to hear any feedback!

This is my personal portfolio: https://wealth.ly/@sunny
